metadata.title: CVE-2020-19497 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow vulnerability in Mat_VarReadNextInfo5 in mat5.c in tbeumatio (aka MAT File I/O Library) 1.5.17, allows attackers to cause a Denialof Service or possibly other unspecified impacts.

criterions.comment: libmatio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
